title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions: Indulge in luxurious self-care with the Metene Shower Brush! This dual-sided brush features soft nylon bristles for gentle cleansing and stiff natural bristles for effective exfoliation, making it perfect for both wet and dry brushing. The 17-inch wooden handle is equipped with non-slip rubber patches and a convenient hanging rope for easy storage. Keep your skin glowing and healthy by using this brush, recommended for replacement every 3-6 months and regular cleaning every few weeks. Elevate your shower routine with the Metene Shower Brush - your skin will thank you!

Indulge in a luxurious shower experience with the Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles. This dual-sided brush is designed to pamper your skin with its soft nylon bristles that gently clean and effectively wash, while the natural stiff bristles exfoliate for smooth, radiant skin. 

The 17-inch wooden handle features a non-slip rubber patch and hanging rope for easy grip and storage. Use it for wet or dry brushing to invigorate your skin and promote circulation. 

Maintain your skin's health by replacing the brush every 3-6 months and cleaning it every few weeks. Upgrade your shower routine with the Metene Shower Brush and enjoy the benefits of a spa-like experience in the comfort of your own home. Get yours today!
